descriptionHtml:
I found that famous companions in skyrim shouldn\'t just have such few members.
So in the Jorrvaskr Living Quarters you can now find 5 new members. These are:
- Sharazar (Argonian; male)
- Sinmir (Nord; male)
- Mulag (Orc; male)
- Razmir (Khajiit; male)
- Thinahel (Eleven; female)

They all have different weapons even though none of them has an enchanted weapon or any other kind of special weapon just to keep it challenging/fair. 

They\'re immortal so you don\'t have to worry about them in combat. 

Installation: 
Drop the files in the Data folder in your skyrim directory.
Usually this is C:\\Program Files(x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

Uninstall this mod by simply deleting the files from your skyrim directory. 

This is my first mod. It\'s nothing special so please be nice :)
author: DisturbedMoron
